case_title: (Mst.) HAMIDAN BEGUM vs ABDUL RIAZ And Other

issues.issue_3: Defendant failed to provide maintenance for more than 2 years
issues.issue_4: Defendant failed to perform marital obligations for more than 3 years
issues.issue_7: Plaintiff entitled to decree for dissolution of marriage on ground of khula, if so, on what terms

findings.khula_terms: Conditional return of 6 kanals of land

judgment_summary.family_judge_decision: Marriage dissolved on basis of khula; plaintiff ordered to return 6 kanals of land
judgment_summary.additional_district_judge_decision: Appeal dismissed; affirmed Family Judge's decision
judgment_summary.high_court_decision: Orders to return 6 kanals of land declared without lawful authority and of no legal effect

key_points.land_details: 6 kanals transferred via hibanama as consideration for marriage

costs: Each party to bear their own costs
